evidence.name: Uncertainty
evidence.summary: I'm not sure how to answer this question. Maybe Octagon Head can give me a hint?

evidence.name: Police activity
evidence.summary: Leo's cops are all over the place. They've got a perimeter and a search party set up, and the rest of the city's on alert.

evidence.name: Fire at 2:35
evidence.summary: At 2:40am, the landlord reported a fire, which had tripped the fire alarm at 2:35. It's all burnt out, now.

evidence.name: Evidence
evidence.summary: Here's what the evidence is.

evidence.name: Hologram Thing
evidence.summary: There's a hologram by the door, depicting some robber- looking guy firing a gun. The bullet's barely an inch out of the barrel, pointing towards where the wizard's corpse is.

spell.name: Projection
spell.summary: There's a Living Memory projection by the door- some robber- looking guy fired a gun. The bullet's barely an inch out of the barrel, pointing towards where the wizard's corpse is.

identified.name: Hologram Thing
identified.summary: There's a hologram by the door- Slick Emmup firing a gun. The bullet's barely an inch out of the barrel, pointing towards where the wizard's corpse is.

both.name: Projection
both.summary: There's a Living Memory projection by the door- Slick Emmup firing a gun. The bullet's barely an inch out of the barrel, pointing towards where the wizard's corpse is.

evidence.name: Burnt Corpse
evidence.summary: There's a body lying in the ash by the door. It's been singed pretty badly, but it might still be recognizable. Holding an unloaded gun.

identified.name: Slick Emmup
identified.summary: Slick Emmup's body is lying in the ash by the door. He's been singed pretty badly, and he's holding an unloaded gun.

shot.name: Slick Emmup
shot.summary: Slick Emmup's body is lying in the ash by the door. The true cause of death seems to be a bullet hole. He's holding an unloaded gun.

evidence.name: Slick's Wound
evidence.summary: Slick's corpse has a tiny bullet hole in it. It's pretty weird, since the landlord only reported one gunshot earlier, and the wizards don't have guns.

gofaked.name: Slick's Wound
gofaked.summary: Slick's corpse has a tiny bullet hole in it. He was probably shot in this room earlier, but... he's the only one with a gun. Was it a suicide?

runed.name: Slick's Wound
runed.summary: Slick Emmup's got a bullet hole in him, from his own gun. One of the wizards used a Reversing Rune sticker on his bullet.

evidence.name: Living Memory
evidence.summary: A level 1 Stop Wizard can cast an illusion of a memory- a snapshot of anything they remember seeing. The projection lasts for two hours.

evidence.name: Mass Arrest Momentum
evidence.summary: A level 1 Stop Wizard can freeze stuff in front of them in time with a word, until either the wizard dismisses it, or a target passes a constitution saving throw. Then it starts moving again.

evidence.name: Flesh to Stone
evidence.summary: A level 2 Stop Wizard can straight-up turn a fella into a statue- unless the target's already afflicted with a status effect, in which case the spell rebounds.

evidence.name: Portable Hole
evidence.summary: A level 1 Go Wizard can space-warp a hole to get through things. Max size is two meters wide and four meters deep. Closes if the wizard is over six meters away.

evidence.name: Reversing Rune
evidence.summary: A level 1 Go Wizard can draw a rune on a sticker, and use it to instantly reverse the direction and velocity of whatever it's stuck to.

evidence.name: Emergency Exit
evidence.summary: A level 2 Go Wizard can use fire as a portal, as long as it's big enough to walk through. They become immune to fire for 30 seconds, and can warp 2 kilometers.

evidence.name: Stop Tattoos
evidence.summary: To become a Stop Wizard, one of the requirements is getting tattooed with some special symbols. We found these in the Stop Wizardry spellbook.

evidence.name: Stop Wizard
evidence.summary: A Stop Wizard who was in the apartment at the time of the murder. Seems to have suffered the effects of a Flesh to Stone backfire.

evidence.name: Go Tattoos
evidence.summary: To become a Go Wizard, you have to get these kinda ugly tattoos on your face. We found a diagram in the Go Wizardry spellbook.

evidence.name: Weird tattoos
evidence.summary: The victim has tattoos on his face- some sort of arrows on his cheeks, and fire drawn around his eyes.

evidence.name: Go Wizard
evidence.summary: One of the bodies lying on the floor has tattoos that mark him as a Go Wizard. Seem's he's shot through the heart- who's to blame? Who gives love a bad name?

evidence.name: Used candle
evidence.summary: A red candle that wizard's corpse was holding. The wick's burnt, which implies that the candle has been used at some point.

evidence.name: Bullet wound
evidence.summary: The red-robed guy on the floor's got a hole in him, right over the heart. There's blood everywhere. It's gross.

tidy.name: Bullet wound
tidy.summary: The red-robed guy on the floor's got a hole in him, right over the heart. It's suspiciously round and tidy, though.

evidence.name: Charred robes
evidence.summary: The victim's robes are singed pretty badly near the hem, but it doesn't look like the rest of him got burned. Probably not the cause of death.

evidence.name: Virgin's blood
evidence.summary: A half-full bottle of extra-virgin virgin's blood. Useful component in all kinds of demonic rituals, and worth a mint on the black market.

evidence.name: Pentagram table
evidence.summary: This table was going to be used for a ritual, but it looks like it was destroyed by the fire before anyone could use it for anything.

evidence.name: Melted candles
evidence.summary: A large patch of hardened wax on the floor. Some of the candles are still intact, and their wicks are still new. Melted, but never lit.

evidence.name: Ash pile
evidence.summary: There's a huge pile of fine ash heaped up in the corner of the room. It's probably from the fire that burned out before we got here.

evidence.name: Haywire
evidence.summary: There are loops of wire, like you'd use to bind hay bales out in the country, scattered in the big pile of ashes. Hmm...

evidence.name: Levelup ritual
evidence.summary: The book on the table describes a ritual for leveling up as a Stop or Go wizard. Light five candles around a pentagram, then sacrifice a goat in the middle.

evidence.name: Tub of concrete
evidence.summary: Underneath the curtain was a bathtub full of dried concrete. It's a pretty concrete piece of evidence.

evidence.name: Goat
evidence.summary: There's a goat tied up in the corner of the room. Doesn't belong to Opal, even though she's been absentmindedly petting it.
